column1: Local Foods////Speaking about what's between the bread
column2: it's filled with a myriad of fresh vegetables. The roasted brussels sprouts inside of the sandwich are brilliant
column3: and by far my favorite vegetable inside the sandwich. Also
column4: the hummus rocks and I swear the cauliflower inside had a bit of a curry flavor. I'm telling you
column5: this sandwich is a party in my mouth.
